headline: Allegion to Attend 2025 Morgan Stanley Annual Laguna Conference
summary: DUBLIN, September 03, 2025--Allegion plc (NYSE: ALLE) Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer Mike Wagnes will discuss the company’s long-term strategy at the 2025 Morgan Stanley Annual Laguna Conference on Wednesday, Sept. 10. The conference will be held in Laguna Beach, California.

headline: Here's Why Allegion (ALLE) is a Strong Growth Stock
summary: Whether you're a value, growth, or momentum investor, finding strong stocks becomes easier with the Zacks Style Scores, a top feature of the Zacks Premium research service.
